name: SQA Toolkit
short_description: This project is a fork of the good but abandonned RTH (stands for Requirement and Testing Hub). Our aim is to stabilize the project and then, to add extra functionnalities and link it to external softwares (Selenium, JMeter...). We'll release developper previews on a regular basis before entering alpha testing.
